properties.entry: select * from( select rownum num, * from ( ${sql} ))where num >=({currParge}-1)*{pargeSize}+1 and num<={currParge}*{pargeSize}
CREATE TABLE LOGINFO ( ID_ VARCHAR(64) PRIMARY KEY, REV_ NUMBER, USERNAME VARCHAR(100), LOGTIME TIMESTAMP(6) DEFAULT SYSDATE, LOGTYPE VARCHAR(100), BIZTYPE VARCHAR(500), LOGCONTENT TEXT);
